duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyzing and processing transactions related to Private Security and Real Estate maintenance.
Communicating effectively with clients, authorized third parties, and asset sponsors to resolve discrepancies or follow-up on requests.
Adhering strictly to trust regulations and security standards.
Processing cash and securities transactions in the trust accounting system.
Ensuring all transactions are processed accurately and according to the relevant documentation.
Proactively communicating with asset sponsors or government agencies via phone to validate requests and understand the path to completion for each transaction.
Quickly remediating any issues or concerns arising from sponsor or agency contact.
Communicating findings to end clients as needed.
Communicating with clients via phone to advise them of the status of their request.
Assisting in processing activities related to institutional client conversions and deconversions.
Developing an understanding of processing activities across multiple security types (private equity and real estate).
Processing complex activities related to bulk vendor valuations, client valuation notices, and litigation activities.
Leading institutional client conversions and de-conversions.
Creating action plans and ensuring timely execution of related processing activities.

education_certification.credential: Demonstrated data entry skills required.0-1 year Financial Services experience required.
